battleship2000.programlogic.domain.ship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.ship.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hittable, Movable, Turnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aircarrier, CannonShip, Commander, MissileShip, Submarine

    public class Ship
extends Object
implements Movable, Turnable, Hittable
    A class that defines the size, name heading, capabilities and other attributes of the ships used in the game.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

      • setPosition

        public boolean setPosition(int x,
                  int y)
        Sets the ship's position on the table if the all the requirements are met.
        Parameters:
        x - the ship's new x-coordinate on the table
        y - the ship's new y-coordinate on the table
        Returns:
        true if the ship was set on the desired position, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShipPlacement.setShipsPosition(int x, int y)

      • getSquaresToBomb

        public List<Square> getSquaresToBomb(Square square)
        Returns the squares that the particular ship bombs.

        Note! For now, this method returns the same square it has been given as a parameter. Its use will be meaningless until the game has been expanded and the ship's can be specialized.

        Parameters:
        square - the square chosen to be bombed
        Returns:
        a list of squares to be bombed based on the square given as a parameter
